alert.note: Alert for Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 15 at 10:00AM MDT until April 16 at 12:01PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Montana... Lodge Creek near International Border affecting Northern Blaine County and Hill County zones. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Lodge Creek near International Border. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:25 AM MDT Saturday the stage was 2.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Sunday afternoon at 1200 PM MDT.
